name: Namco Gallery Vol. 3
description:
Namco Gallery Vol. 3 is the last in a series of classic game compilations for the Game Boy. It includes four different games, all enhanced for the Super Game Boy. Only one of them appeared on the Game Boy before, the other being new ports from the Famicom.
  • Sky Kid (new port)
  • Babel no T? (new port)
  • Family Tennis (new port)
  • Jantaku Boy
The cartridge includes in-game instructions and high scores for all games that are saved via password.
